translation.subHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to actively participate and use all functions in the Catena-X Automotive Network Portal. Most of the tasks can be done in parallel.
translation.regiStep: Register to Catena-X by entering all information requested in the following 5 Steps
translation.regiSubHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to actively participate and use all functions in the Catena-X Automotive Network Portal. Most of the tasks can be done in parallel.
